bayou.text

Interface TextDoc

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HtmlDoc
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Html4Doc, Html5Doc

    public interface TextDoc
    Textual document, for example text/html, text/plain.

    A TextDoc has a ContentType, and a content body which is a sequence of chars.

    • Method Summary

      Abstract Methods
      ContentType getContentType()
      Get the content type of this document, for example "text/html;charset=UTF-8".
      Charset getCharset()
      Get the charset of this document, for example "UTF-8".
      void getContentBody(Consumer<CharSequence> out)
      Print the content body to `out`.
      Default Method
      CharSequence getContentBody()
      Get the content body.

    • Method Detail

      • getContentType

        ContentType getContentType()
        Get the content type of this document, for example "text/html;charset=UTF-8".

        The content type should contain a "charset" parameter that is consistent with getCharset().

      • getCharset

        Charset getCharset()
        Get the charset of this document, for example "UTF-8".

        The charset should be consistent with getContentType().

      • getContentBody

        void getContentBody(Consumer<CharSequence> out)
        Print the content body to `out`.

        The implementation of this method may invoke `out.accept()` multiple times.

      • getContentBody

        default CharSequence getContentBody()
        Get the content body.

        This default implementation invokes getContentBody(out) and merges outputs to one char sequence.
